statement.p: After a 35 reduction, you purchase a new digital player for 315.25. What was the price of the digital player before the reduction?
A) First write an equation you can use to answer this question. Use \displaystyle{x} as your variable and express any percents in decimal form in the equation.
B) Solve your equation in part A to find the original price of the digital player.
Answer: The original price of the digital player was dollars.
